title: Incorrect Results when Applying Invalid Filter Expression 'row[0]'
description: When setting a filter condition like 'row[0] equals to 0', or just returning a null result set.
OB: When attempting to set a filter expression with 'row[0] equals to 0' and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: The expected behavior is that when setting a filter expression like 'row[0] equals to 0' and clicking on the Preview tab, no records should be returned. This is because 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data has been fetched and should not be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the condition 'row[0] equals to 0'.
2. Click on the Preview tab.
